solution_line_template: Since {below_b_percentage}% of his students got below B, {total_percentage}% - {below_b_percentage}% = {above_b_percentage}% of Mr. Sanchez's students got B and above.

Thus, {total_students} x {above_b_percentage}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{total_students}*{above_b_percentage}/{percentage_denominator}={students_above_b}>>{students_above_b} students got B and above in their final grade.
